alluxio.client.block.stream

Class LocalFilePacketWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • alluxio.client.block.stream.LocalFilePacketWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PacketWriter, Cancelable, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    @NotThreadSafe
public final class LocalFilePacketWriter
extends Object
implements PacketWriter
    A local packet writer that simply writes packets to a local file.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static LocalFilePacketWriter create(BlockWorkerClient blockWorkerClient,
                                           long blockId,
                                           int tier)
                                    throws IOException
        Creates an instance of LocalFilePacketWriter. This requires the block to be locked beforehand.
        Parameters:
        blockWorkerClient - the block worker client, not owned by this class
        blockId - the block ID
        tier - the target tier
        Returns:
        the LocalFilePacketWriter created
        Throws:
        IOException - if it fails to create the packet writer

        Returns:

        public void writePacket(io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf buf)

        Description copied from interface: PacketWriter
        Writes a packet. This method takes the ownership of this packet.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        Throws:
        IOException - if it fails to write the packet

      • cancel

        public void cancel()
            throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: Cancelable
        Cancels the write to Alluxio storage. This will delete all the temporary data and metadata that has been written to the worker(s). This method should be called when a write is aborted.
        Specified by:
        cancel in interface Cancelable
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is a failure when the worker invalidates the cache attempt

        Description copied from interface: PacketWriter
